overview: Badul, a part-time musician gets a job as a debt collector at Haji Lamin’s firm. Haji Lamin is impressed with Badul who pretends to be a pious person. He intends to make him his son-in-law. But one day Haji Lamin was so shocked to see Badul dancing away at a restaurant. But Badul claims that it is his twin brother, Badal. There is utter chaos when Haji Lamin falls in love with badul’s mother while his daughter nora, falls for Badal.
title: Guru Badul
